meanings: (물건이) break; (산산조각 나다) smash, shatter; (금이 가다) crack
술집에서 I'm getting a very bad headache.
술집에서 My head feels like it's going to explode.
술집에서 I have a massive headache.

meanings.meaning: headaches of a skull bursting kind

vlive.korean: 하시면서 친구와의 우정이 또 깨질 수 있는 그런... It's a game which can break your friendship. 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “환상의 대똥촉파티(Feat. 마피아게임)” (갓세븐 : GOT7)
vlive.english: It's a game which can break your friendship.

vlive.korean: 거울이 깨질 수 있잖아 - 거울... 왜 깨져요? The mirror could break. - The mirror...why would it break? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 오랜만에 연습실 브이라이브~?!? 😁
vlive.english: The mirror could break. - The mirror...why would it break?

vlive.korean: 그럼 머리가 깨질 것 같아요. I think your head will crack. 듣기 View video SF9 : 🍧
vlive.english: I think your head will crack.

vlive.korean: 깨질 뻔했어. I almost broke it. 듣기 View video INFINITE : 이호원의 집.방
와장창 이러면 깨질 수도 있지. If it falls, it can break. 듣기 View video FANTAGIO MUSIC : [단편영화 프로젝트 : beginning] #3 윤정혁 <빅빅월드> Yun Jeong Hyuk - Big Big World)
vlive.english: If it falls, it can break.

examples.korean: Living in this goldfish bowl of publicity would crack the strongest marriage. 발음듣기 유명인으로 이렇게 사생활이 다 노출된 상황 속에서 살게 되면 아무리 단단한 결혼 생활도 깨질 수가 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Living in this goldfish bowl of publicity would crack the strongest marriage. 발음

examples.korean: The body's state of equilibrium can be disturbed by stress. 발음듣기 스트레스에 의해 몸의 균형상태가 깨질 수 있다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: The body's state of equilibrium can be disturbed by stress. 발음

examples.korean: My head is pounding. 발음듣기 머리가 깨질 듯이 아프다 Neungyule
I have a bad hangover because I had too much drink last night. 발음듣기 어제 술을 너무 많이 마셨더니 머리가 깨질 것 같아요. Neungyule
examples.english: I have a bad hangover because I had too much drink last night. 발음

examples.korean: I've got a splitting headache. 발음듣기 머리가 깨질 듯이 아프다 Neungyule
examples.english: I've got a splitting headache. 발음
